scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:MediaGalleries_BrowseMediaGalleries_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:MediaGalleries_BrowseMediaGalleries_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="showTitleColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle_MediaGallery" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showGroupColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup_MediaGallery" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showPostsColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showLastPostColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="group" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group" defaultValue="Group=-1" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_groupLookup" enableCurrent="true" /> <property id="groupAndSubGroups" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GroupAndSubGroups" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="itemsBeforeScroll" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> <property id="defaultSortOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder" defaultValue="ApplicationName" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="ApplicationName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName" /> <propertyValue value="Posts" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Posts" /> <propertyValue value="LastPost" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_LastPost" /> <propertyValue value="ApplicationIdsOrder" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom" /> </property> <property id="gallerySelection" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GalleryInclusion" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_galleryOrder" key="gallery" includeSubGroupsPropertyId="groupAndSubGroups" visibilityPropertyId="defaultSortOrder" visibilityPropertyValue="ApplicationIdsOrder" groupPropertyId="group" /> <property id="includeGroupName" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_IncludeGroupName" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="LastUpdated">Latest: {0}</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_BrowseMediaGalleries_Description">Displays a browse control to view all media galleries on the site.</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_BrowseMediaGalleries_Name">Media Gallery - Browse Media Galleries</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_BrowseMediaGalleries_Title_BrowseFileGalleries">Browse File Galleries</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="post_plural"> files</resource> <resource name="post_singular"> file</resource> <resource name="Sort_Ascending">Ascending</resource> <resource name="Sort_Descending">Descending</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ApplicationName">By name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Custom">Custom order</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_DefaultSortOrder">Sort Order</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GalleryInclusion">Include Galleries</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group">Filter to Group</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_GroupAndSubGroups">Show data from Group and all Subgroups</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_IncludeGroupName">Include current group's name in Title (Title must be a formatted string with a {0} placeholder)</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow">Number of results to display</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_LastPost">By last updated date</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_NoResults">No results could be found.</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Posts">By file count</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowGroup_MediaGallery">Show File Gallery Group Name</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest">Show Latest File Date</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts">Show Post Count</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowTitle_MediaGallery">Show File Gallery Name</resource> </language>
